ExtlRecShrOpportunity.name: ExtlRecShrOpportunity
ExtlRecShrOpportunity.description: Represents the opportunity for Partner Connect in the vendor org if you’re a partner and the partner org if you’re the vendor.

ExtlRecShrCnctId.description: ID of the external record share connection.

ExtlRecShrOpportunity.accessRules: To see this object, enable Partner Connect or Partner Connect for Vendors. See Set Up Partner Connect as a Partner and Set Up Partner Connect as a Vendor in Salesforce Help.
